Reviews.Content: travel time berlin occasions travel agents educational trip city hotel base spacious clean breakfast typical german continental plenty choice restaurant views staff especially bar evening helpful friendly location isnt hotels stayed public transport berlin outstanding stations close reach main attractions stay hotel lovely

Reviews.Title: “Very nice hotel with friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: elninomagico
Reviews.Content: fourth visit berlin fourth hotel city booking priceline didnt supply deal hoping due error booking engine paying standard rate hotel oh upgraded bigger worth bathroom spacious extremely clean serviced day location close sbahn ubahn travel kudamm etc mcdonalds directly underneath hotel staff extremely helpful friendly especially polish waiter lifts didnt cause whatsoever pretty straight forward hotel lovely terrace sit outside warmer weather drinks stay hotel
